sourcesContent:
My Heroes

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Hero } from '../hero'; import { HeroService } from '../hero.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-heroes', templateUrl: './heroes.component.html', styleUrls: ['./heroes.component.css'] }) export class HeroesComponent { hero: Hero = {id: 1, name: ''} heroes: Hero[] = []; selectedHero?: Hero; onSelect(hero: Hero): void { this.selectedHero = hero; } }
